Description:
Detects execution of the perl binary with the "-e" flag and common strings related to potential reverse shell activity

Author: @d4ns4n_, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Perl Reverse Shell Execution
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '%fdopen(%' and command like '%::socket::inet%') and (command like '%socket%' and command like '%connect%' and command like '%open%' and command like '%exec%')) and (process_path like '%/perl' and command like '% -e %'))
